name: 劉玉蓀
objective:
一、線性連立方程式
二、矩陣基本運算
三、行列式
四、向量
五、向量空間
schedule:
1.　　Systems of linear equations and matrics. (4 weeks)
2.　　Determinants (3 weeks)
3.　　Vectors (3 weeks)
4.　　Euclidean vector spaces (3 weeks)
5.　　General vector space (optional)
6.　　Inner product spaces (optional)
7.　　Eigenvalues and eigenvectors (optional)
scorePolicy:
Homework  40%
Two Midterm Exam.    20% each 
Final Exam        20%
materials:
Textbook: 
Elementary Linear Algebra, 9th ed.,  by Howard Anton 
publisher東華書局/新月圖書
